titles.title: To suspend temporarily the duty on Permethrin.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 5/11/2005--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 2009, the duty on 2-Methyl-[1,1'-biphenyl]-3-yl)methyl 3-(2-chloro-3,3,3-trifluoro-1-propenyl)-2,2-dimethylcyclopropanecarboxylate (Permethrin).
